draad164: Inline Supabase queries with fallback aggregation
draad165: OPTIE 1: SDK cache disabling with X-Client-Cache-Buster header
draad165-status: Active - Every request forces fresh database read
notes: DRAAD165 OPTIE 1: Supabase SDK session-level caching disabled via X-Client-Cache-Buster header. This header creates unique token per request, forcing SDK to skip internal query cache. HTTP headers + ETag + SDK cache disabling = guaranteed fresh data.
